name: Poker Timer - Deluxe
description:
A simple customizable timer to aid the flow of almost ANY game.

Buzzer sound alert when countdown reaches ZERO.
Flashing screen when countdown reaches ZERO (epilepsy-safe).
The app will pause time if the phone needs to do something else (like answer a call).
Pleasant animated background.
Timer show minutes, seconds and milliseconds.
Pause / Reset / Resume ... all with simple intuitive touches.
